name: dicebox.core
description: Core libraries for the DiceBox API platform

scripts.lint: black -l 120 . --check && pylint --rcfile=.pylintrc src test tools projects
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wheel
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage: coverage report -m && coverage xml && coverage html
scripts.environment:dependencies:test: conda install pylint black coverage python-dotenv safety -y && pip install python-mnist
scripts.environment:dependencies:application: conda install -c apple tensorflow-deps -y && pip install tensorflow-macos && pip install tensorflow-metal && conda install pillow configparser pika requests tqdm -y
